divs: sighting detailsi was at a car show at the brooklyn, ct fairgrounds. sitting in a chair next to my hot rod, i was looking up at the sky as it was a beautiful day, sunny, clear and breezy. i saw sunlight bounce off the object which originally attracted my attention. i knew it was a ufo when i first saw it. it had three circles, all connected, silve\gray in color. there was a main circle, then one at five o'clock and one at eleven o'clock. it moved slowly, front right to left. there were two clouds, separated but apparent. the object went into the cloud and never came back out. that is how i lost site of the object.
Summary: I saw the object move from the right, went behind a cloud and never came out.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Hartford
There were no other sightings in Hartford on or around September 8th 2013
